title: Business Intelligence Analyst
description:
VibeCore Analytics is Recruiting a Business Intelligence Analyst (Full-Time)

VibeCore Analytics, a Paris-based analytics firm, delivers insights for clients in finance, retail, and tech. We’re excited to invite a Business Intelligence Analyst to join our team and drive data-driven decisions.

Role Overview
You’ll create BI solutions to help clients optimize their strategies, working with data to uncover actionable insights.

Key Responsibilities
- Develop BI reports using Power BI and SQL.
- Analyze business data to identify key trends.
- Collaborate with clients to define reporting needs.
- Optimize data models for performance.
- Train clients on BI tools.
- Conduct data quality checks.
- Stay updated on BI trends.
- Prepare client presentations with insights.
- Support project planning for BI initiatives.
- Contribute to team knowledge sharing.

Qualifications Needed
We seek candidates with 2–3 years of experience in business intelligence, proficient in Power BI and SQL. Strong data visualization and communication skills are essential, along with experience in client-facing projects. A Bachelor’s degree in data science, business, or a related field is required.

Why VibeCore?
We’re a team that values data and collaboration. Our hybrid work model offers flexibility, and we provide training programs to keep you at the forefront of BI. You’ll work on impactful projects in a supportive environment.

Benefits
Health insurance
Pension plan
25 days of annual leave
Professional development budget
Access to BI tools
Team-building events

Join Us
If you’re passionate about business intelligence, apply now to join VibeCore Analytics!

#VibeCoreCareers #BusinessIntelligence #HiringNow
